content.p: Key speakers and panelists include Dean of NUBS Malaysia, Dr Lau Chee Kwong; NUBS Malaysia Director of Research, Dr Mohan Avvari; and Deputy Dean of Nottingham University Business School UK, Professor Sally Hibbert. For event details and registration, visit www.sdgambitionmonth.com telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8000 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8019
